title: Ghost hunters
creator_contributor_role: National Film Board of Canada, production company
subject_group: Armed Forces, Military, War & Weapons/Military art and science - History
Armed Forces, Military, War & Weapons/Airplanes, Military
Armed Forces, Military, War & Weapons/Canada. Royal Canadian Air Force
Communications, Infrastructure, & Transport/Airplanes - Design and construction
description: A flight in the Royal Canadian Air Force's Argus airplane, to Gibraltar and back, provides a convincing demonstration of Canada's wide-ranging defense against underwater attack. Specially designed and electronically equipped for detecting submarines, this tireless airborne hunter can stay aloft a full day, probing for its hidden foe.
